SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent.fragment

Class ChosenListFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.chicksevent.fragment.ChosenListFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class ChosenListFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
Fragment displaying the list of entrants who have been selected (invited) for an event.

This screen shows users in the "INVITED" status from the event's waiting list. It allows the organizer to send a notification to all invited users via Organizer.sendWaitingListNotification(java.lang.String).

Key Features:

  • Real-time display of invited entrants using ValueEventListener
  • Send bulk notification to all invited users
  • Navigation to Events, Create Event, and Notifications

Data is loaded from Firebase under: /WaitingList/{eventId}/INVITED Each child key is treated as a user ID and displayed using UserAdapter.

See Also:
  • Organizer
  • EntrantStatus
  • UserAdapter

    • listEntrants

      public void listEntrants()
      Overloaded method to list entrants with a default status of EntrantStatus.WAITING.

      Delegates to listEntrants(EntrantStatus) with WAITING.

    • listEntrants

      public void listEntrants(EntrantStatus status)
      Attaches a real-time listener to Firebase to load entrants with the specified status.

      Listens to: /WaitingList/{eventId}/{status} Each child key is converted to a User and added to userDataList. The adapter is recreated and set on every data change.

      Parameters:
      status - the EntrantStatus to filter entrants by (e.g., INVITED, WAITING)

      Returns:
      trimmed string, or empty string if input is null
